Cleanse skin.sentence: The nurse prepares the cleansing solution.
Cleanse skin.subject: The nurse

Cleanse skin.sentence: The nurse gathers sterile gauze or wipes.
Cleanse skin.subject: The nurse

Cleanse skin.sentence: The nurse positions the patient for access to the skin area.
Cleanse skin.subject: The nurse
Cleanse skin.object: the patient for access to the skin area

Cleanse skin.sentence: The nurse applies the cleansing solution to the sterile gauze or wipes.
Cleanse skin.subject: The nurse
Cleanse skin.object: the cleansing solution to the sterile gauze or wipes

Cleanse skin.sentence: The nurse gently cleanses the designated skin area using the moistened gauze or wipes.
Cleanse skin.subject: The nurse
Cleanse skin.object: the designated skin area using the moistened gauze or wipes
